Verses: 1 vidiyarkaalamaanapodhu, Sagala Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Janaththin Moopparum, Yesuvaik Kolaiseyyumpadi, Avarukku Virodhamaaga Aalosanaipanni,
2 avaraik Katti, Kondupoi, Dhesaadhipadhiyaagiya Pondhiyu Pilaaththuvinidaththil Oppukkoduththaargal.

3 appozhudhu, Avaraik Kaattikkoduththa Yoodhaas, Avar Marana Akkinaikkullaagath Theerkkappattadhaik Kandu, Manasdhaabappattu, Andha Muppadhu Vellikkaasaip Piradhaana Aasaariyaridaththirkum Moopparidaththirkum Thirumbak Konduvandhu:
4 kutramillaadha Raththaththai Naan Kaattikkoduththadhinaal Paavanjeydhen Endraan. Adharku Avargal: Engalukkenna, Adhu Unpaadu Endraargal.
5 appozhudhu, Avan Andha Vellikkaasai Dhevaalayaththile Erindhuvittu, Purappattuppoi, Naandrukondu Seththaan.
6 piradhaana Aasaariyar Andha Vellikkaasai Eduththu: Idhu Raththakkirayamaanadhaal, Kaanikkaip Pettiyile Idhaippodalaakaadhendru Solli,
7 aalosanaipannina Pinbu, Anniyarai Adakkampannuvadharkuk Kuyavanudaiya Nilaththai Adhinaale Kondaargal.
8 idhinimiththam Andha Nilam Innaal Varaikkum Raththanilam Ennappadugiradhu.
9 isravel Puththiraraal Madhikkappattavarukkuk Kirayamaagiya Muppadhu Vellikkaasai Avargal Eduththu,
10 karththar Enakkuk Karpiththapadi Kuyavanudaiya Nilaththirkaaga Adhaik Koduththaargal Endru Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisiyinaal Uraikkappattadhu Appozhudhu Niraiveritru.
11 yesu Dhesaadhipadhikku Munbaaga Nindraar; Dhesaadhipadhi Avarai Nokki Nee Yoodharudaiya Raajaavaa Endru Kettaan. Adharku Yesu: Neer Sollugirapadidhaan Endraar.
12 piradhaana Aasaariyarum Moopparum Avarmel Kutranjaattukaiyil, Avar Maaruththaram Ondrum Sollavillai.
13 appozhudhu, Pilaaththu Avarai Nokki: Ivargal Unmel Eththanaiyo Kutrangalai Saattugiraargale, Nee Avaigalaik Ketkavillaiyaa Endraan.
14 avaro Oru Vaarththaiyum Maaruththaramaaga Sollavillai; Adhanaal Dhesaadhipadhi Migavum Aachchariyappattaan.
15 kaavalpannappattavargalil Evanai Vidudhalaiyaakkavendumendru Janangal Kettukkolvaargalo, Avanai Avargalukkaaga Vidudhalaiyaakkuvadhu Pandigaidhorum Dhesaadhipadhikku Vazhakkamaayirundhadhu.
16 appozhudhu Kaaval Pannappattavargalil Barapaas Ennappatta Perpona Oruvan Irundhaan.
17 poraamaiyinaale Avarai Oppukkoduththaargal Endru Pilaaththu Arindhu,
18 avargal Koodiyirukkaiyil, Avargalai Nokki: Evanai Naan Ungalukku Vidudhalaiyaakkavendumendrirukkireergal? Barapaasaiyo? Kiristhu Ennappadugira Yesuvaiyo? Endru Kettaan.

19 avan Niyaayaasanaththil Utkaarndhirukkaiyil, Avanudaiya Manaivi Avanidaththil Aalanuppi: Neer Andha Needhimaanai Ondrum Seyyavendaam; Avar Nimiththam Indraikku Soppanaththil Vegu Paadupatten Endru Solla Sonnaal.
20 barapaasai Vittuvidak Kettukkollavum, Yesuvai Kolaiseyvikkavum Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Moopparum Janangalai Evivittaargal.
21 dhesaadhipadhi Janangalai Nokki: Ivviruvaril Evanai Naan Ungalukkaaga Vidudhalaiyaakkavendum Endru Kettaan. Adharku Avargal: Barapaasai Endraargal.
22 pilaaththu Avargalai Nokki: Appadiyaanaal, Kiristhu Ennappadugira Yesuvai Naan Enna Seyyavendum Endru Kettaan. Avanai Siluvaiyil Araiyavendum Endru Ellaarum Sonnaargal.
23 dhesaadhipadhiyo: En, Enna Pollaappu Seydhaan Endraan. Adharku Avargal: Avanai Siluvaiyil Araiyavendum Endru Adhigamadhigamaaik Kookkuralittu Sonnaargal.

24 kalagam Adhikamaagiradheyallaamal Than Pirayaththanaththinaale Pirayojanamillaiyendru Pilaaththu Kandu, Thanneerai Alli, Janangalukku Munbaagak Kaigalaikkazhuvi: Indha Needhimaanudaiya Raththappazhikku Naan Kutramatravan, Neengale Paarththukkollungal Endraan.
25 adharku Janangalellaarum: Ivanudaiya Raththappazhi Engal Melum Engal Pillaigal Melum Iruppadhaaga Endru Sonnaargal.
26 appozhudhu, Avan Barapaasai Avargalukku Vidudhalaiyaakki, Yesuvaiyo Vaarinaal Adippiththu, Siluvaiyil Araiyumpadikku Oppukkoduththaan.
27 appozhudhu, Dhesaadhipadhiyin Porchchevakar Yesuvaith Dhesaadhipadhiyin Aramanaiyile Kondupoi, Porchchevakarin Koottam Muzhuvadhaiyum Avaridaththil Kootivarachcheydhu,
28 avar Vasthirangalaik Kazhatri, Sivappaana Melangiyai Avarukku Uduththi,
29 mullugalaal Oru Mudiyaip Pinni, Avar Sirasinmel Vaiththu, Avar Valadhukaiyil Oru Kolaikkoduththu, Avar Munbaaga Muzhangaarpadiyittu: Yoodharudaiya Raajaave, Vaazhga Endru Avaraip Pariyaasampanni,
30 avarmel Thuppi, Andhak Kolai Eduththu, Avarai Sirasil Adiththaargal.
31 avaraip Pariyaasampanninapinbu, Avarukku Uduththina Melangiyaik Kazhatri, Avarudaiya Vasthirangalai Avarukku Uduththi, Avarai Siluvaiyil Araiyumpadi Konduponaargal.
32 pogaiyil Sirene Ooraanaagiya Seemon Ennappatta Oru Manushanai Avargal Kandu, Avarudaiya Siluvaiyaich Sumakkumpadi Avanaip Balavandhampanninaargal.
33 kapaalasthalam Endru Arththangollum Kolgodhaa Ennum Idaththukku Avargal Vandhapodhu,
34 kasappukkalandha Kaadiyai Avarukkuk Kudikkak Koduththaargal; Avar Adhai Rusipaarththu, Kudikka Manadhillaadhirundhaar.

35 avarai Siluvaiyil Araindhapinbu, Avargal Seettuppottu Avarudaiya Vasthirangalaip Pangittukkondaargal. En Vasthirangalaith Thangalukkulle Pangittu, En Udaiyin Peril Seettuppottaargal Endru Theerkkadharisiyaal Uraikkappattadhu Niraiverumpadi Ippadi Nadandhadhu.
36 avargal Ange Utkaarndhu, Avaraik Kaavalkaaththukkondirundhaargal.
37 andriyum Avar Adaindha Aakkinaiyin Mugaandharaththaik Kaanpikkum Poruttu, Ivan Yoodharudaiya Raajaavaagiya Yesu Endru Ezhudhi, Avar Sirasukku Melaaga Vaiththaargal.
38 appozhudhu, Avarudaiya Valadhu Pakkaththil Oruvanum Avarudaiya Idadhu Pakkaththil Oruvanumaaga Irandu Kallar Avarodekooda Siluvaigalil Araiyappattaargal.
39 andha Vazhiyaai Nadandhupogiravargal Thangal Thalaigalaith Thulukki:
40 dhevaalayaththai Idiththu, Moondru Naalaikkulle Kattugiravane, Unnai Neeye Ratchiththukkol; Nee Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranaanaal Siluvaiyilirundhu Irangi Vaa Endru Avaraith Thooshiththaargal.
41 appadiye Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Vedhapaaragarum Moopparum Pariyaasampanni:
42 matravargalai Ratchiththaan; Thannaiththaan Ratchiththukkollath Thiraaniyillai; Ivan Isravelin Raajaavaanaal Ippozhudhu Siluvaiyilirundhu Irangivarattum, Appozhudhu Ivanai Visuvaasippom.
43 thannai Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranendru Solli, Dhevanmel Nambikkaiyaayirundhaane; Avar Ivanmel Piriyamaayirundhaal Ippozhudhu Ivanai Ratchikkattum Endraargal.
44 avarodekooda Siluvaigalil Araiyappatta Kallarum Andhappadiye Avarai Nindhiththaargal.
45 aaraam Mani Neramudhal Onpadhaam Mani Neram Varaikkum Boomiyengum Andhakaaram Undaayitru.
46 onpadhaam Mani Neraththil Yesu: Elee! Elee! Laamaa Sabakdhaani, Endru Migundha Saththamittuk Kooppittaar; Adharku En Dhevane! En Dhevane! En Ennaik Kaivitteer Endru Arththamaam.
47 ange Nindravargalil Silar Adhaik Kettapozhudhu: Ivan Eliyaavaik Kooppidugiraan Endraargal.
48 udane Avargalil Oruvan Odi, Kadarkaalaanai Eduththu, Kaadiyil Thoiththu, Adhai Oru Kolil Maatti, Avarukkuk Kudikkak Koduththaan.
49 matravargalo: Poru, Eliyaa Ivanai Ratchikka Varuvaano, Paarppom Endraargal.
50 yesu Marupadiyum Magaasaththamaaik Kooppittu, Aaviyai Vittaar.
51 appozhudhu, Dhevaalayaththin Thiraichcheelai Melthodangik Keezhvaraikkum Irandaagak Kizhindhadhu, Boomiyum Adhirndhadhu Kanmalaigalum Pilandhadhu.
52 kallaraigalum Thirandhadhu, Niththirai Adaindhirundha Anega Parisuththavaangaludaiya Sareerangalum Ezhundhirundhadhu.
53 avar Uyirththezhundhapinbu, Ivargal Kallaraigalaivittup Purappattu, Parisuththa Nagaraththil Piravesiththu Anegarukkuk Kaanappattaargal.

54 nootrukku Adhipadhiyum, Avanodekooda Yesuvaik Kaaval Kaaththirundhavargalum, Boomiyadhirchchiyaiyum Sambaviththa Kaariyangalaiyum Kandu, Migavum Payandhu: Meyyaagave Ivar Dhevanudaiya Kumaaran Endraargal.
55 melum, Yesuvukku Oozhiyanjeyyumpadi Galileyaavilirundhu Avarode Vandhirundha Anega Sthireegal Ange Thooraththile Nindru Paarththukkondirundhaargal.
56 avargalukkulle Magadhalenaa Mariyaalum, Yaakkopukkum Yosekkum Thaayaagiya Mariyaalum, Sebadheyuvin Kumaararudaiya Thaayum Irundhaargal.
57 saayangaalamaanapodhu, Yesuvukku Seeshanum Aisuvariyavaanumaayirundha Yoseppu Ennum Perkonda Arimaththiyaa Ooraanaagiya Oru Manushan Vandhu,
58 pilaaththuvinidaththil Poi, Yesuvin Sareeraththaik Kettaan. Appozhudhu, Sareeraththaikkodukkumpadi Pilaaththu Kattalaiyittaan.
59 yoseppu Andha Sareeraththai Eduththu, Thuyyadhaana Melliya Thuppattiyile Sutri,
60 thaan Kanmalaiyil Vettiyirundha Thannudaiya Pudhiya Kallaraiyile Adhai Vaiththu, Kallaraiyin Vaasalil Oru Periya Kallaip Purattivaiththupponaan.
61 ange Magadhalenaa Mariyaalum, Matra Mariyaalum Kallaraikku Edhiraaga Utkaarndhirundhaargal.
62 aayaththanaalukkup Pinnaana Marunaalile Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Pariseyarum Pilaaththuvinidaththil Koodivandhu:
63 aandavane, Andha Eththan Uyirodirukkumpodhu, Moondru Naalaikkup Pin Ezhundhiruppen Endru Sonnadhu Engalukku Gnaapagamirukkiradhu.

64 aagaiyaal, Avanudaiya Seeshargal Raaththiriyile Vandhu, Avanaik Kalavaaik Kondu Poi, Mariththorilirundhu Ezhundhaanendru Janangalukku Sollaadhapadikkum, Mundhina Eththaippaarkkilum Pindhina Eththu Kodidhaakaadhapadikkum, Neer Moondru Naal Varaikkum Kallaraiyaip Paththirappaduththumpadi Kattalaiyida Vendum Endraargal.
65 adharkup Pilaaththu: Ungalukkuk Kaavalsevagar Unde; Poi, Ungalaal Koodiyamattum Paththirappaduththikkollungal Endraan.
66 avargal Poik Kallukku Muththiraipottu, Kaaval Vaiththu, Kallaraiyaip Paththirappaduththinaargal.
